name: PowerMouse
description:
Allows to bind actions of your choice to the following mouse gestures performed in editor:
  • press-and-hold of right mouse button (bound to "File Structure" by default)
  • simultaneous press of left and right mouse buttons (bound to "Show Usages" by default)
notes:
• 2.10 Change default binding for right button click to "File Structure".
    Fix occasional simultaneous triggering of both mouse actions.
  • 2.9 Version for IDEA 2020.1
  • 2.8 Fix issue with binding of certain non-default actions to gestures
  • 2.7 Version for IDEA 2019.1
  • 2.6 Version for IDEA 2018.3 - restores correct context menu for parameter hints
  • 2.5 Version for IDEA 2017.1
  • 2.4 Show correct context menu for parameter hints
  • 2.3 Version for IDEA 2016.3, also includes a couple of bugfixes
  • 2.2 Fixed more cases of several actions' simultaneous triggering
  • 2.1 Fixed occasional simultaneous triggering of several actions
  • 2.0 New mouse gesture is recognized - press-and-hold of right mouse button
  • 1.0 Initial version
